data.title: Mostra Internazionale Ideata e Realizzata da Carlo Acutis e Nicola Gori
data.text:
AN INTERNATIONAL EXHIBITION DESIGNED AND CREATED BY CARLO ACUTIS THE SERVANT OF GOD

Carlo Acutis

Creator of the Exhibition

The Eucharistic Miracles of the World

If your parish or organization would like to exhibit the Church approved photographic International Exhibition

of The Eucharistic Miracles of the World or, if you would like to know more informations, please contact:

Associazione Amici di Carlo Acutis

Phone: 0039.339.6340122

info@carloacutis.com - www.carloacutis.com

info@miracolieucaristici.org - www.miracolieucaristici.org

or Carol J. Seydel

The Real Presence Eucharistic Education and Adoration Association

Phone: 815-609-7331 - miracles@therealpresence.org - http://www.therealpresence.org

Please Note: To hold the exhibition, you will need special high definition PDF to make your posters (166, size 60x80cm).

Relevant Articles about the Eucharistic Miracles
